_meta.description: Card definitions for Chronicles. Starting deck is defined in config.json.

melee_strike.name: Strike
melee_strike.description: A swift blow. Adds +2 to your die roll.

melee_guard.name: Guard
melee_guard.description: Brace for impact. Reduces damage taken by 4 on failure.

melee_bash.name: Bash
melee_bash.description: Force through. Lowers the hazard difficulty by 2.

melee_cleave.name: Cleave
melee_cleave.description: A heavy swing. Adds +3 to your die roll.

melee_parry.name: Parry
melee_parry.description: Turn the blow aside. Reduces damage taken by 6 on failure.

melee_reckless.name: Reckless Swing
melee_reckless.description: Everything you've got. Adds +4 but take 3 damage regardless.

hazard_keen_eye.name: Keen Eye
hazard_keen_eye.description: You see it clearly now. Adds +2 to your die roll.

hazard_steady_hand.name: Steady Hand
hazard_steady_hand.description: Calm under pressure. Lowers the hazard difficulty by 2.

hazard_quick_step.name: Quick Step
hazard_quick_step.description: Dodge the worst of it. Reduces damage taken by 5 on failure.

hazard_sharp_instinct.name: Sharp Instinct
hazard_sharp_instinct.description: You feel it before it comes. Adds +3 to your die roll.

hazard_iron_nerve.name: Iron Nerve
hazard_iron_nerve.description: No roll needed. You walk through it like you already knew the way.

hazard_second_look.name: Second Look
hazard_second_look.description: Wait. Try again. Lets you reroll the die once.

magic_spark.name: Spark
magic_spark.description: A flash of arcane force. Adds +2 to your die roll.

magic_ward.name: Ward
magic_ward.description: A shimmer in the air. Reduces damage taken by 5 on failure.

magic_shatter.name: Shatter
magic_shatter.description: The obstacle cracks apart. Lowers the hazard difficulty by 3.

magic_restore.name: Restore
magic_restore.description: Deep magic pulls you back from the edge. Restores 10 health.

magic_veil.name: Veil
magic_veil.description: You were never here. Bypasses the hazard entirely.

_comment_zone2: === ZONE 2 DISCOVERY CARDS — The Fractured Reach ===

melee_overload.name: Overload
melee_overload.description: Channel fractured energy through your blade. Adds +4 to your die roll.

hazard_scan.name: Scan
hazard_scan.description: Residual tech maps the danger. Lowers the hazard difficulty by 3.

magic_surge.name: Surge
magic_surge.description: Raw power crackles between worlds. Adds +3 to your die roll.

melee_last_stand.name: Last Stand
melee_last_stand.description: Everything you have left. Adds +5 to your die roll.

hazard_glimpse.name: Glimpse
hazard_glimpse.description: You see through it — the danger was never real. Bypasses the hazard entirely.

magic_unravel.name: Unravel
magic_unravel.description: Pull the threads of reality apart. Lowers the hazard difficulty by 4.
